condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2018, Quality of education is improved for all children, girls and boys, including those of the most disadvantaged

description.narrative: Teachers of formal basic education, in targeted primary schools, are trained and offer to 24867 students (5713 girls and 19154 boys) quality learning that improves their skills in both French and mathematics and the Elementary Primary Studies Certificate success rate. | Status:Met | As-of Date:04/02/2020

title.narrative: Number of girls and boys provided with individual education/early learning materials through UNICEF-supported programmes (humanitarian and development)

Countries have effective education systems for learning outcomes, including early learning (SP 2.b.3)
